name: Disconnected (Ep2)
description:
Disclaimer:

If you haven't played the first episode, do so here:

https://geqwe.itch.io/disconnected

The third and last episode will be out at some time in the future.

Description:

A detective is trying to escape a mountain while being hunted by the police.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to move (Player, Boat, Car)

[H] to open controls, hints and objectives

[E] to open/close flashlight

[G] to use medkit

Change sensitivity from pause menu [Esc]

Left-Click to shoot, R to reload

A game created by Giorgos Kletsas

Music Composer:

Iestyn Haberfield

https://soundcloud.com/iestyn-marcus-haberfield

itch.io: Iestyn Marcus Music

Voice acting:

 (John): https://www.fiverr.com/mr_andrewjones?source=order_page_summary_seller_link

(Tom): WanderingVoiceActor

Rate and comment for feedback. Check the Devlog too!

This game was made for Dutch Unity Community Game Jam.
